mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.mishu_uuid_number as mishuUuidNumber ,a.mishu_name as mishuName ,a.mishu_phone as mishuPhone ,a.mishu_photo as mishuPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.mishu_email as mishuEmail ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM mishu a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.mishu_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.mishuUuidNumber},'%')
and a.mishu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.mishuName},'%')
and a.mishu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.mishuPhone},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.mishu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.mishuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
